name: Troupe
description:
Game features

  • 2D controls. Jump, run, crouch and attack while facing demonic enemies.
  • Unlock all the skills that a circus master is able to do.
  • Explore every room in the castle and rescue your troupe.
  • Face seven extremely differentiated minions and 4 epic bosses.
  • 2D art all handmade.
  • Original soundtrack.
